availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Speed Smith Goodloe (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Son of David S. Goodloe and Sally A. Goodloe. Married to Mary E. Shreve Goodloe in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 5, 1860. Resident of Lexington in 1850. Graduated from Centre College in 1856. Resident of Lexington in 1860. Attorney in Lexington. Judge of the Lexington City Court from 1862 to 1870.
